name: Artesian Resources Corporation
description: Artesian Resources Corporation is a publicly traded water utility company based in the United States, primarily serving Delaware and the surrounding regions. Founded in 1905, Artesian provides water and wastewater services to residential, commercial, and industrial customers. The company is committed to delivering high-quality water and ensuring sustainable water supply through responsible resource management. Artesian operates several well fields and treatment facilities to meet the growing demand for clean water. In addition to water supply, Artesian Resources also offers a range of related services, including wastewater management and environmental consulting. With a focus on innovation, Artesian has implemented advanced technologies to enhance water quality, improve operational efficiency, and minimize environmental impact. The company is dedicated to community engagement and sustainability, actively participating in local initiatives to promote water conservation and education. Artesian Resources is also recognized for its commitment to customer service, providing reliable support and information to its clients. The company’s mission is to provide safe, reliable, and affordable water services while preserving the environment for future generations.

seo.meta_title: Artesian Resources Corporation | Water Utility Services
seo.meta_description: Learn about Artesian Resources Corporation, a leading water utility provider in Delaware, dedicated to delivering high-quality water and wastewater services.

faq.question: What services does Artesian Resources provide?
faq.answer: Artesian Resources provides drinking water supply and wastewater management services.

faq.question: Where is Artesian Resources headquartered?
faq.answer: Artesian Resources is headquartered in Newark, Delaware, USA.
